articles.description: GOOGLE has canned its budget-friendly Pixel 3a from its online store. But with no sign of the Pixel 4a on the horizon, what is happening?
articles.content: Google has discontinued its wildly-popular Pixel 3a and 3a XL smartphones. These handsets – the first Pixel-branded devices to launch with a more affordable mid-range price tag – were powered by a sl… [+1904 chars]

articles.title: Google just banned 25 more Android apps, now you need to delete them from your phone - Express.co.uk
articles.description: ANOTHER 25 Android apps have been banned by Google. Here's why you should consider removing them from your smartphone.
articles.content: Just last month, Google ditched more than 50 apps from its Play Store over concerns the software could fill devices with annoying adware and leave Android users with a phone that's constantly being b… [+1810 chars]
